  index: "emails",
  refresh: "true",
  operations: [
    {
      index: {
        _id: 1,
      },
    },
    {
      accounts: ["hillary", "sidney"],
    },
    {
      index: {
        _id: 2,
      },
    },

      accounts: ["hillary", "donald"],
    },

        _id: 3,
      },

    },

});
console.log(response);
